laboratory_examinations.findings: More than 50 small adenomas identified in the right side of the colon; two large adenomas measuring more than 1 cm in diameter.

laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Endoscopic examination of the stomach and duodenum
laboratory_examinations.findings: Fundic-gland polyps in the stomach and a tubular adenoma in the duodenum.
50 to 100 diminutive adenomas in the cecum and the right side of the colon.
The patient does not carry the truncating mutation at codon 169.
Germ-line mutation resulting in premature truncation at the 5' end of the gene.
